name: Unhome
description:
Play Unhome - a short and devastating suburban gothic horror point-and-click adventure.

Content Warning:
This game features particularly sensitive content that may be triggering for some players.  In the interest of keeping this warning spoiler-free, know that the game contains some, but not all, of the below content:

  • Domestic Abuse
  • Spiders
  • Child Loss
  • Tryptophobic Imagery
  • Self Harm
  • Mental Illness
  • Graphic Violence

- note: still in alpha.
- - -

Created for the Indie Horror Game Jam of 2021.

Programmed by Ryan Troock (@HalflingWeed|io)
Art by Chantal Ryan (link)
Written by Rap Game Guattari (.io) & Chantal Ryan (link)
Music & SFX by UnknownCharacter(@_KnownCharacter|soundcloud|.io)
